incidents.name: Verify experienced an increase in HTTP 500 and 503 codes and latencies on the Verifications API.

incident_updates.body: Twilio Verify was degraded for 28 minutes between 21:50:49 and 22:18:16 UTC Pacific Time on 09/05/2025. During this period of time customers may have experienced an increase in HTTP 500 and 503 codes and latencies on the Verifications API. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Proxy API affected with elevated HTTP 500 errors

incident_updates.body: Twilio Proxy API was degraded for 15 minutes between 17:17 and 17:32 Pacific Time on 09/01/2025. During this period of time, customers may have experienced elevated HTTP 500 errors including Flex. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Errors for the Twilio Rest API Impacting Multiple Twilio Services

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple services. This incident has been resolved.

We will continue monitoring to ensure the Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple services do not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to confirm a full recovery and provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will continue monitoring to ensure the Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple services do not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to confirm a full recovery and provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will continue monitoring to ensure the Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple services do not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to confirm a full recovery and provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will continue monitoring to ensure the Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple services do not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to confirm a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will continue monitoring to ensure the Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple services do not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to confirm a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will continue monitoring to ensure the Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple services do not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to confirm a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will continue monitoring to ensure the Twilio Rest API issues impacting multiple services do not reoccur. We will be monitoring all services to confirm a full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery with the Twilio Rest API issue impacting multiple Twilio services starting at approximately 5:16 AM UTC. Our engineering team has identified the problem, implemented a fix, and we are now seeing services recover. We will continue monitoring all services to ensure full recovery and will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate issues impacting the Programmable Messaging API, TaskRouter, Proxy and Programmable Video starting at approximately 5:16 AM UTC. During this period, about 0.1% of Programmable Messaging API requests (~2,500 requests) returned 5xx errors. TaskRouter is seeing approximately 80 errors (503) from Proxy and Video is reporting 106 requests with status 503. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating issues impacting the Programmable Messaging API, TaskRouter, Proxy and Programmable Video starting at approximately 5:16 AM UTC. During this period, about 0.1% of Programmable Messaging API requests (~2,500 requests) returned 5xx errors. TaskRouter is seeing approximately 80 errors (503) from Proxy and Video is reporting 106 requests with status 503. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue for Messaging, Proxy, TaskRouter, and Programmable Video. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing MMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to Verizon Wireless in United States of America. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
